nums[front]: nums[back];\n                int a = (nums[front] >= nums[back])? nums[back]: nums[front];\n            \n                if(a+most_occuring_diff <= k){ // change b value\n                    changes += 1;\n                }\n                else if(b - most_occuring_diff >= 0 && b - most_occuring_diff <= k){\n                    changes += 1;\n                }\n                else{\n                    changes += 2;\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return changes;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-array-changes-to-make-differences-equal","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
